name: NeuroDungeon
description:
Delve into the depths of the brain and save the prisoners held captive by the evil Dr. Neuron! Learn facts about the Trigeminal nerve as you explore, solve puzzles and look for the prisoners!

NeuroDungeon is a game where players must explore a dungeon which represents the entirety of the Trigeminal nerve in its layout. Players will find info related to the nerve as they explore and eventually will have to use what they learned to solve puzzles and answer quizzes. Players will gain points from learning, answering questions, saving prisoners and interacting with the scenery; making the game more competitive and rewarding.

Special thanks to the info and aid in testing from Trinity College and TuDublin.

Credits:

  • Claudio Visentin: Lead Programmer
  • Shane Carrol: Game Designer, Programmer
  • Megan Grant: Production
  • James Bryan: 3D Modelling
  • Chris Finn: Audio Design 

Original Release Date: December 2019
